title: One Frosty Christmas
description: Hannah Storey has lots of friends, but not in River Bend. Teased by the local kids for being a city girl and an amputee, Hannah feels alone and isolated just like the old pony she sees on the way to and from school every day. Hannah vows to save the pony the local kids have cruelly nicknamed "Frostbite" from freezing to death or being sent to slaughter. Will Hannah be able to save the pony? Will the people of River Bend ever accept her?"One Frosty Christmas" is a classical Christmas story about love, friendship, and the true meaning of Christmas. While it is written for young adults, everyone who loves horses and inspirational stories will enjoy the read.
author: Laura Hesse
